modules.name: Content Quality
modules.description: Evaluates depth, accuracy, and comprehensiveness of content
insights: Content is very basic and lacks depth

issues.message: 20 pages are under 500 words and lack substance
Content lacks examples, case studies, and detailed explanations

recommendations.title: Comprehensive content expansion
recommendations.description: Significantly expand content across all pages
actionItems: Expand 20 short pages to minimum 1,000 words
Add detailed examples and case studies
Include comprehensive explanations and practical applications
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 20-25 point increase in Content Quality score

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Expertise, Experience, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness indicators
insights: Author bylines missing on 80% of content

issues.message: 80% of content pages lack author attribution

recommendations.title: Establish author attribution system
recommendations.description: Create author profiles and add bylines to all content
actionItems: Create comprehensive author bio pages
Add author bylines to all 30 pages
Include credentials, experience, and expertise
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 25-30 point increase in E-E-A-T score

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.description: Site structure, performance, and technical implementation
insights: Missing schema markup on most pages

issues.message: Slow page load times on mobile

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive technical SEO
recommendations.description: Add schema markup and optimize performance
actionItems: Add schema markup to all 25 pages
Optimize images and improve load times
Implement proper redirects and fix crawl errors
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 15-20 point increase in Technical SEO score

modules.name: AI Readability
modules.description: How well content is structured for AI search engines
insights: Poor content structure for AI parsing

recommendations.title: Restructure content for AI readability
actionItems: Fix heading hierarchy on 22 pages
Add structured data markup
Improve content organization
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 12-18 point increase in AI Readability score

modules.name: Link Profile
modules.description: Quality and relevance of inbound and internal links

issues.message: 25 pages have no internal inbound links

recommendations.title: Comprehensive link building strategy
recommendations.description: Fix orphaned pages and build backlinks
actionItems: Add internal links to 25 orphaned pages
Develop comprehensive backlink strategy
Create linkable assets and content
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 20-25 point increase in Link Profile score over 6-12 months

modules.name: User Intent Alignment
modules.description: How well content matches search intent and user queries
insights: Content depth doesn't match user expectations

recommendations.title: Align content with search intent
recommendations.description: Review and update content to match user intent
actionItems: Analyze search intent for all target keywords
Update 15 pages to match intent
Add appropriate CTAs and content depth
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 15-20 point increase in User Intent Alignment score

modules.name: Brand Signals
modules.description: Brand mentions, citations, and online presence

issues.message: Extremely limited brand citations and mentions

recommendations.title: Build comprehensive brand presence
actionItems: Create profiles on all relevant directories
Develop comprehensive PR and marketing strategy
Build partnerships and co-marketing opportunities
recommendations.estimatedImpact: Expected 25-30 point increase in Brand Signals score over 12 months
